title: Pauli Murray: The Autobiography of a Black Activist, Feminist, Lawyer, Priest, and Poet
description: Pauli Murray (1910-1985)is regarded as "one of the least discussed figures in the history of twentieth-century African American women's activism." She was a highly regarded Feminist, who called attention to the plight of women, especially the colored and working poor. Roy Wilson
author: Pauli Murray
